name: peanut seed production, at farm | peanut seed, at farm | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15657/documentation

This global dataset is a copy of the regional IN dataset, except for the following modifications.;The production volume represents the global annual production.;The geographicalCorrelation score of every pedigree matrix of was changed to '5'.;Yield of the global dataset = 3840 kg/ha, calculated as a weighted average of the regional yields.;The comments below were part of the IN regional dataset.;This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of peanut seed (fresh matter) at farm. The yield is 3840 kg/ha at a moisture content at storage of 13%.;This process is identical to the ecoinvent process 'protein pea production, Swiss integrated production, intensive' which is used as a proxy for peanut seed production at farm. This dataset refers to an average situation; for specific situations exchanges might differ substantially due to site specific parameters

This activity starts after the harvest of the previous crop. The inputs of seeds, mineral fertilisers and pesticides are considered. Farm manure as an organic fertiliser is only accounted for in terms of direct field emissions; all pre-processes are included in the animal production systems.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, sowing, fertilisation, weed control, pest and pathogen control, combine-harvest, transport from field to regional processing centre (10 km) and drying of grains. Further, direct field emissions are included. The cultivation of green manure during winter before sowing peas is also included. This activity ends after drying of grains at the regional processing centre.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period referring to the data source: 1996-2003. Based on expert opinion data is considered to be valid at least up to 2012.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The amount of the exchanges are copy from a regional dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data were compiled from statistics, pilot network, fertilising recommendations, documents from extension services, information provided by retailers and expert knowledge. The production data were verified and adjusted by a group of experts.

The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Fertiliser/s used in this dataset is/are: 'nitrogen fertiliser, as N', 'phosphate fertiliser, as P2O5', 'urea, as N'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of fertiliser/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 2.40E-01 kg of packaging for fertilisers is justified with this exchange.
